content.raw: Yes I understand. Thank you for your fast answer. I installed it from debian package and it works. I hope it will be enough. My goal was to speed up the simulation using compiled from source one as written in this topic : [http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/12477/speeding-up-gazebo-physics-simulation-considering-ros-plugin-usage/](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/12477/speeding-up-gazebo-physics-simulation-considering-ros-plugin-usage/)
